		ANSWER_BACK as string,
		BENEFICIAL_OWNER_ID as decimal(38,18),
		BENEFICIAL_OWNER_START_DATE as timestamp,
		COMMERCIAL_OPERATOR_ID as decimal(38,18),
		COMMERCIAL_OP_START_DATE as timestamp,
		REGISTERED_OWNER_ID as decimal(38,18),
		REGISTERED_OWNER_START_DATE as timestamp,
		THIRD_PARTY_OPERATOR_ID as decimal(38,18),
		THIRD_PARTY_OPERATOR_START_DAT as timestamp,
		TECHNICAL_MANAGER_ID as decimal(38,18),
		TECHNICAL_MANAGER_START_DATE as timestamp,
		NOMINAL_OWNER_ID as decimal(38,18),
		NOMINAL_OWNER_START_DATE as timestamp,
		TOTAL_CASUALTIES as decimal(38,18),
		TOTAL_CASUALTIES_LAST_5_YEARS as decimal(38,18),
		TOTAL_CASUALTIES_LAST_12_MONTH as decimal(38,18),
		CASUALTY_DATE as timestamp,
		COLLISIONS as decimal(38,18),
		MACHINERY_DAMAGE as decimal(38,18),
		HULL_DAMAGE as decimal(38,18),
		PIRACY as decimal(38,18),
		INCIDENTS_RESULT_IN_POLLUTION as decimal(38,18),
		INCIDENT_RESULT_IN_LOS_OF_LIFE as decimal(38,18),
		TOTAL_DEAD as decimal(38,18),
		TOTAL_MISSING as decimal(38,18),
		TOTAL_INJURED as decimal(38,18),
		LATEST_INCIDENT_PRECIS as string,
		TOTAL_INSPECTIONS as decimal(38,18),
		TOTAL_DETENTIONS as decimal(38,18),
		INSPECTIONS_LAST_3_YEARS as decimal(38,18),
		DETENTIONS_LAST_3_YEARS as decimal(38,18),
		INSPECTIONS_LAST_12_MONTHS as decimal(38,18),
		DETENTIONS_LAST_12_MONTHS as decimal(38,18),
		LATEST_INSPECTION_DATE as timestamp,
		NUMBER_DEFICIENCI_LAST_3_YEAR as decimal(38,18),
		DETENTION_IND as string,
		INSPECTION_PRECIS as string,
		NUMBER_OWNER as double,
		COUNT_ENG_BUILDER as double,
		COUNT_DESIGNATION as double,
		COUNT_GBOWNER_CHG_5Y as double,
		VALID_FROM as timestamp,
		VALID_TO as timestamp,
		INSERT_DATE as timestamp,
		UPDATE_DATE as timestamp,
		company_id as integer,
		account_resp_me as string,
		account_resp_pi as string,
		account_status as string,
		client_lost_reason as string,
		company_email as string,
		company_name as string,
		company_owner_full_name as string,
		gard_contact_id as string,
		gard_market_area_code as string,
		gard_market_area_desc as string,
		parent_company_id as double,
		parent_company_name as string,
		source_system_id as integer,
		primary_contact_email as string,
		primary_contact_name as string,
		source_system as string,
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string,
		ID as string,
		PRG_PRODUCT_GROUP_ID as string,
		PRG_PRODUCT_GROUP_NAME as string,
		PRG_PRODUCT_GROUP_SHORT_NAME as string,
		PRO_PRODUCT_ID as string,
		PRO_PRODUCT_NAME as string,
		PRO_PRODUCT_SHORT_NAME as string,
		PRO_SOURCE_INDICATOR as string,
		PRO_PRODUCT_TYPE as string,
		source_code_key as string,
		target_code as string,
		target_description as string,
		code_type_id as double,
		code2 as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		code_type as string,
		PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		PARENT_TARGET_CODE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Other']) ~> tcrossreference
lloydsvesselhistory, manager lookup(TECHNICAL_MANAGER_ID == company_id_mgr,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> companyMgr
lloydscompany select(mapColumn(
		company_id_benOwner = COMPANY_ID,
		obj_gbo_owner = COMPANY_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> benificialOwner
lloydscompany select(mapColumn(
		company_id_comOper = COMPANY_ID,
		obj_operator = COMPANY_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> commercialOperator
lloydscompany select(mapColumn(
		company_id_regOwner = COMPANY_ID,
		obj_reg_owner = COMPANY_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> regOwner
lloydscompany select(mapColumn(
		company_id_mgr = COMPANY_ID,
		obj_manager = COMPANY_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> manager
companyMgr, benificialOwner lookup(BENEFICIAL_OWNER_ID == company_id_benOwner,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> companyGBowner
companyGBowner, commercialOperator lookup(COMMERCIAL_OPERATOR_ID == company_id_comOper,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> companyOperator
companyOperator, regOwner lookup(REGISTERED_OWNER_ID == company_id_regOwner,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> companyRegOwner
companyRegOwner, beneficialOwnerCountry lookup(BENEFICIAL_OWNER_ID == company_id_benOwnCtry,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> companyGBOwnerCnty
companyGBOwnerCnty, managerCountry lookup(TECHNICAL_MANAGER_ID == company_id_mgrCntry,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> companyMgrCnty
companyMgrCnty, operatorCountry lookup(COMMERCIAL_OPERATOR_ID == company_id_operCntry,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> companyOperatorCnty
companyComOwnerCnty select(mapColumn(
		key = VESSEL_KEY_COLUMN,
		obj_object_name = VESSEL_NAME,
		obj_sourceid = VESSEL_ID,
		obj_imo_number = IMO,
		obj_built_year = YEAR_OF_BUILD,
		obj_flag_iso3_code = FLAG,
		obj_status_code = STATUS,
		obj_object_type_code = VESSEL_TYPE_CODE,
		obj_object_type = VESSEL_TYPE,
		obj_dwt = DWT,
		obj_fdwt = FORMULA_DWT,
		obj_gt = GROSS,
		obj_breadth_extreme = BREADTH_EXTREME,
		obj_breadth_moulded = BREADTH_MOULDED,
		obj_depth = DEPTH,
		obj_hull_type_code = HULL_TYPE,
		obj_material_build_code = MATERIAL_OF_BUILD,
		obj_num_of_decks = NO_DECKS,
		obj_num_of_total_tanks = TOTAL_TANKS,
		obj_propulsion_code = PROPULSION_TYPE,
		obj_speed = SPEED,
		obj_num_of_crew = NO_CREW,
		obj_num_of_passengers = NO_PASSENGERS,
		obj_cap_bale = BALE_CAPACITY,
		obj_cap_car = CAR_CAPACITY,
		obj_cap_trailer = TRAILER_CAPACITY,
		obj_cap_gas = GAS_CAPACITY,
		obj_cap_grain = GRAIN_CAPACITY,
		obj_cap_liquid = LIQUID_CAPACITY,
		obj_cap_teu = TEU_CAPACITY,
		obj_num_of_hatches = TOTAL_HATCHES,
		obj_num_of_holds = TOTAL_HOLDS,
		obj_num_of_propellers = TOTAL_PROPELLERS,
		obj_propeller_type_code = COMMON_PROPELLER_TYPE_CODE,
		obj_ship_builder = VESSEL_BUILDER,
		obj_date_construction_start = CONSTRUCTION_START,
		obj_date_launch = LAUNCH_DATE,
		obj_date_construction_end = CONSTRUCTION_END,
		obj_date_dead = DEAD_DATE,
		obj_class1_code = CLASS1_CODE,
		obj_class1 = CLASS1,
		obj_iceclass = CLASS1_ICE_CLASS,
		obj_iceclasstext = CLASS1_ICE_CLASS_TEXT,
		obj_class2_code = CLASS2_CODE,
		obj_class2 = CLASS2,
		obj_pandi_club_code = PI_CLUB_ID,
		obj_pandi_club = PI_CLUB,
		obj_total_kw = POWER_KW,
		obj_rpm = MAXIMUM_RPM,
		obj_hp = HP,
		obj_engine_builder = ENGINE_BUILDER,
		obj_engine_designation = ENGINE_DESIGNATION,
		obj_engine_designer = ENGINE_DESIGNER,
		obj_num_of_cylinders = NO_CYLINDERS,
		obj_cylinder_arrangement = CYLINDER_ARRANGEMENT,
		obj_engine_type = ENGINE_TYPE,
		obj_stroke_type = STROKE_TYPE,
		obj_fuel_type = FUEL_TYPE,
		obj_fuel_type_2 = FUEL_TYPE2,
		obj_manager_code = TECHNICAL_MANAGER_ID,
		obj_date_valid_from = VALID_FROM,
		obj_date_valid_to = VALID_TO,
		obj_manager,
		obj_gbo_owner,
		obj_operator,
		obj_reg_owner,
		obj_gb_owner_country_desc,
		obj_gbo_owner_country,
		obj_manager_country_desc,
		obj_manager_country_code,
		obj_operator_country_desc,
		obj_operator_country_code,
		obj_reg_owner_country_desc,
		obj_reg_owner_country
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tmptabell
tmptabell derive(code_type_id_market = 806,
		code_type_id_object_type = 45,
		source_system = 'LLOYDS',
		code_type_id_country = 50,
		code_type_id_flac = 100,
		obj_gard_objectid = '',
		obj_flag_iso3 = '',
		obj_status = '',
		obj_class3 = '',
		obj_class3_code = '',
		obj_m3 = '',
		obj_ship_builder_country = '',
		obj_service_speed = '',
		obj_length_overall = '',
		obj_hullid = '',
		obj_date_built = '',
		obj_propeller_type_desc = '',
		obj_hullid_type = '',
		obj_propulsion = '',
		obj_material_build = '',
		iceclass = '',
		iceclasstext = '',
		last_updated_by = 'pre_dim_object',
		lloyds_vessel_id = obj_sourceid) ~> derivedColumns
derivedColumns, xref lookup(code_type_id_market == xref@code_type_id_xref
	&& source_system == source_system_xref
	&& obj_gbo_owner_country == xref@source_code_key_xref,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> marketArea
marketArea, xref lookup(code_type_id_country == xref@code_type_id_xref
	&& derivedColumns@source_system == xref@source_system_xref
	&& obj_gbo_owner_country == xref@source_code_key_xref,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> country
country, xref lookup(obj_object_type_code == xref@source_code_key_xref
	&& code_type_id_object_type == xref@code_type_id_xref
	&& derivedColumns@source_system == xref@source_system_xref,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> objectTypeDesc
objectTypeDesc, xref lookup(derivedColumns@source_system == xref@source_system_xref
	&& obj_flag_iso3_code == xref@source_code_key_xref
	&& code_type_id_flac == xref@code_type_id_xref,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> flagDesc
flagDesc derive(tobereplaced_obj_object_type = case(isNull(target_description_object_type), obj_object_type, target_description_object_type),
		tobefound_obj_flag_iso3 = case(isNull(target_description_flag), obj_flag_iso3, target_description_flag)) ~> expression
lloydscompany select(mapColumn(
		company_id_benOwnCtry = COMPANY_ID,
		obj_gb_owner_country_desc = COUNTRY,
		obj_gbo_owner_country = ISO3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> beneficialOwnerCountry
lloydscompany select(mapColumn(
		company_id_mgrCntry = COMPANY_ID,
		obj_manager_country_desc = COUNTRY,
		obj_manager_country_code = ISO3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> managerCountry
lloydscompany select(mapColumn(
		company_id_operCntry = COMPANY_ID,
		obj_operator_country_desc = COUNTRY,
		obj_operator_country_code = ISO3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> operatorCountry
lloydscompany select(mapColumn(
		company_id_cowcnty = COMPANY_ID,
		obj_reg_owner_country_desc = COUNTRY,
		obj_reg_owner_country = ISO3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> commercialOwnerCntry
companyOperatorCnty, commercialOwnerCntry lookup(COMMERCIAL_OPERATOR_ID == company_id_cowcnty,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> companyComOwnerCnty
tcrossreference select(mapColumn(
		each(match(/* All input columns */ true()),
			/* Input name */ lower($$)+'_xref' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xref
